a.n: NBA TV Finals Film Room: 30th Anniversary of Lakers vs. Pistons

p.k: To mark the 30th anniversary of the historic 1988 Lakers-Pistons Finals, NBA TV will produce a special edition of "Film Room". Hall of Famers Isiah Thomas and James Worthy ('88 Finals MVP) along with John Salley, will take viewers through the action, defining moments, and strategic plays that characterized one of the most iconic NBA Finals series in league history.
